title: unesco_heritage_Historical_Monuments_of_Mtskheta
text:
Name: Historical Monuments of Mtskheta. short_description:

The historic churches of Mtskheta, former capital of Georgia, are outstanding examples of medieval religious architecture in the Caucasus. They show the high artistic and cultural level attained by this ancient kingdom.

. date_inscribed: 1994. danger: 0. date_end: 2016. longitude: 44.71639. latitude: 41.84389. area_hectares: 3.85. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Georgia. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: ge. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
